line_1: On tuneful bards, whom laurel crowns apay;
line_2: Ne is it longer than a winter's day;

line_1: On tuneful bards, whom laurel crowns apay;
line_2: Far from my cot, thou blatant-beast away.

line_1: On tuneful bards, whom laurel crowns apay;
line_2: No husband's noul will I with horns array,
